data.eml:eml: Revision of Angursa (Arthrotardigrada: Styraconyxidae) with the description of a new species from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fujimoto, Shinta, Hansen, Jesper Guldberg (2019): Revision of Angursa (Arthrotardigrada: Styraconyxidae) with the description of a new species from Japan. European Journal of Taxonomy 510: 1-19, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2019.510
